game.name: Shoot Robbers
game.description:
No other chance you could get to shoot your enemies like this. A gun in your hands and you will have to shoot a group of robbers who will appear on the screen time to time. Do not take them for granted as they are also lashed with the dangerous weapons. So the best thing is to kill all of them before they shoot you and clear from the screen in this one of the best action-packed challenges. Join Shoot Robbers and prove the world that you are also good at handing a gun!

Your objective in this cool shooting game is to kill all the robbers you see on the window to save your life. We know that you are not going to allow anyone to enter your room and break into your house to steal your vital commodities. Be careful robbers can pop up from any window in this one of the highly thrilling and most challenging titles from our action category! Take your position and load your gun with the weapons to clear them fast!

Wait for a moment! These cowardly little criminals do not dare and will surely come in front of a window to kill you. Blast away as soon as you see any of these masked criminals! It will only take one bullet to clear each robber. In general, these bad souls visit any home in large groups so do not feel relaxed until you shoot all of them. Put your best shooting abilities to test to check if you are capable enough to keep your accuracy above 50%! Good luck to play like a pro shooter in this one of the top html5 boys games!!
